tag.description: Renders a component with collapsable effect
tag.name: collapsable

attribute.description: It indicates the label to be used in collapsable
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: It indicates the label key (i18n) to be used in collapsable
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: It indicates if component must be opened. Default : false. Options : true,false
attribute.name: opened

attribute.description: Indicates the status of the group. Default: primary. Options: default, primary, danger, info, success
attribute.name: state

attribute.description: It indicates a type format in which the value must be converted. Options: date,datetime, timestamp, hour, currency, zipCode, cnpj, tel, cpf
attribute.name: type

attribute.description: It indicates a match regular expression value
attribute.name: match

attribute.description: It indicates a replace regular expression value
attribute.name: replace

attribute.description: Indicates the id for the component
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: It indicates a css class to the component
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: Indicates a label for the alert.
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Indicates a label key(i18n) for the alert.
attribute.name: labelKey

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component can be closed. Default: false
attribute.name: dismissible

attribute.description: It indicates the state where the box should be rendered. Default: warning. Options: primary, secondary, light, dark, warning, success, danger, info
attribute.name: state

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be rendered. Default : true
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be visible. Default : true
attribute.name: visible

tag.description: Renders importing a js file or css
tag.name: import

attribute.description: Indicates the type of file to be imported. Options: js, css
attribute.name: type

attribute.description: Indicates the URL where the file
attribute.name: url

tag.name: confirm

attribute.description: It indicates the label of the title modal
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Indicates the URL to confirm the operation
attribute.name: url

attribute.description: Indicates the component target. Default: _self. Options: _blank, _newtab, nomedoiframe
attribute.name: target

attribute.description: Indicates the component name that triggers the confirm screen
attribute.name: attachTo

attribute.description: Indicates the component selector that triggers the confirm screen
attribute.name: attachToSelector

tag.example: <html:button id="btn1" label="Confirm that ?"/> <html:confirm url="#" label="Titulo do modal" attachToSelector="#btn1"/>
